text: Hey all, if a user has self selected that they speak a specific language via a field in HubSpot is there any way to show them the right language website next time they visit?
We've done this on a site like this: <https://www.computype.com/>
At the top we change the current url to the proper language url. then all those urls on the pages keep them there.

You could then do a check on the custom property in hubl and redirect to the proper language page if the current page is different than the language they selected.  You'd also want to make them be able to easily change languages on each page, somewhere so they don't do it by accident and then stop using the website because they are stuck.
